mapper.select: SELECT a.sectionFee + a.monthFee AS Fee FROM globalbiz.MemFeeInfo AS a INNER JOIN globalbiz.DeptMst AS b ON a.deptType = b.deptType AND a.memType = b.memType AND a.feeType = b.feeType WHERE b.deptCD = #{deptCD} AND a.bookNum = #{bookNum} AND a.weekNum = #{week}

SELECT a.memKey, CONCAT(IFNULL(mFstName,''), IFNULL(mLstName,'')) AS memName, CONCAT(IFNULL(gFstName,''), IFNULL(gLstName,'')) AS guardianName, addr AS address, city, ePhone AS phone, MIN(statusCD) AS statusCD, globalbiz.FuncCodeDtlNM(#{jisaCD},'0008', MIN(statusCD),'','') AS statusName FROM globalbiz.MemMst AS a INNER JOIN globalbiz.MemSubjMst AS b ON a.memKey = b.memKey WHERE CONCAT(mFstName, mLstName) LIKE CONCAT('%', #{name}, '%') OR CONCAT(gFstName, gLstNAme) LIKE CONCAT('%', #{name}, '%') GROUP BY a.memKey, a.mFstName, a.mLstName, a.gFstName, a.gLstName, a.addr, a.city, a.ePhone
SELECT * FROM globalbiz.MemSubjMst WHERE memKey = #{memKey} ORDER BY statusCD

SELECT a.jisaCD, a.deptCD, a.subj, a.studyNum AS subjStudyNum, a.bookNum AS subjBookNum, a.monthNum AS subjMonthNum, a.digYN AS subjDigYN, a.sortCD, b.memKey, b.statusCD, b.yoil, globalbiz.FuncCodeDtlNM(a.jisaCD,'0006',b.yoil,'E','') AS yoilName, b.studyNum, b.bookNum, b.visitHours FROM globalbiz.DeptSubjInfo AS a LEFT JOIN ( SELECT aa.memKey, aa.subj, statusCD, aa.yoil, aa.studyNum, aa.bookNum, bb.visitHours FROM globalbiz.MemSubjMst AS aa INNER JOIN globalbiz.MemSubjStudy AS bb ON aa.memKey = bb.memKey AND aa.subj = bb.subj WHERE aa.memKey = #{memKey} ) AS b ON a.subj = b.subj WHERE a.jisaCD = #{jisaCD} AND a.deptCD = #{deptCD} ORDER BY -b.statusCD DESC, a.sortCD
